data.title: David and Erica's Story (With Clips)

data.text:
Post by Principessa on

I was going to do a whole recap of David and Erica, but then I realized there's a lot more to them and if you want to know ALL of them, you kind of have to break it down month by month which actually works because we're uploading clips of them right now -- and we're starting at the beginning. Thanks to ellabelle for doing all of the clipping and for helping with well...everything!

So here you go:

February 1999: David and Erica first met in February of 1998, when David treats a young Bianca suffers heart problems as the result of her eating disorder. But on February 4th, 1999 their real story began.

David and Erica met again at the Teen's Against Addiction gala, where David promptly walked away from Vanessa Bennett after she collapsed with chest pains. Erica's impression of David Hayward, who she once thought was charming, changed quickly. She became suspicious and started digging, which caused her to find out more things about this mysterious doctor.

During a bad snowstorm in mid-February David and Erica's paths crossed again in New York. David was desperately trying to find a flight back to Pine Valley - unfortunately, the airport had canceled all flights and there appeared to be no way back to town. Across the terminal, Erica placed a frantic call on her cell phone hoping to find someone to drive her back to town. They both made it to the car rental service at the same time. Erica explained she was to film a commercial or other appearance when she returned, but David had a medical emergency. Unbeknownst to David, Erica snuck into the car, after David refused to give her a ride.

Somewhere between New York City and Pine Valley, Erica marveled at the findings in David's little yellow file folder. David returned to the car while Erica was still reading the file. As they bickered, Erica figured out that David was going to reveal the truth about Colby's paternity at Liza and Adam's wedding. Erica demanded that David drop her off at the next exit, but David refused to pull over. After they bickered some more, Erica suddenly screamed in horror, the had wrecked and a large pole crashed onto the vehicle and went through the windshield.

David had a few scrapes on the side of his face, but he managed to regain consciousness fairly quickly. He looked down at the floor and noticed that his yellow file folder was covered in blood. He then turned to his right to look at Erica... and gasped.

David realized that Erica was impaled, and was going to die if they didn't do something quickly. A piece of wire had punctured Erica's chest. Not only had the wire punctured one of Erica's lungs, but it had also lodged itself dangerously close to Erica's heart and aorta. His only choice was to save her. Erica suddenly stirred, and her body shifted in the car seat - the sudden movement caused the wire to tear into Erica's heart. As blood trickled from Erica's chest, David realized that he would have to begin operating on Erica.

Once Erica woke up at the hospital David entered the room and gave Erica a brief check-up. Erica pulled away as the doctor approached. Myrtle wasn't quite sure why Erica was acting so strangely and explained that David had helped her after the accident. David said it was perfectly normal for trauma victims to have amnesia. Little did she know what the future held for her and the man who almost killed her, and this was only the beginning...

Now that you have the full Februaryback story, you can see all of David and Erica here. (We're still uploading the clips, so we'll post them ASAP.) The descriptions are ABOVE the videos.

February of 1999

David and Erica really first met when David treated Bianca in February of '98. But their second (and most memorable) meeting was a ear later during the Teen's Against Addiction (TAAD) benefit on February 4th, 1999. David and Erica's flirtation is cut short by a 'mystery' woman, Vanessa Bennett. Later, in the parking lot they realize Vanessa is having a heart attack - and the cardiologist, Dr. David Hayward walks away.

"Their Story Begins" February 4th 1999

After Vanessa collapses, and Joe Martin takes her to the hospital Erica confronts Dr. Hayward, wondering why he walked away from a woman in distress. He asks her if there is someone she hated so much that she would walk away from if she knew they were going to die. She replies yes, that there is a man who she hated so much that her mother, who was a saint, let die. Erica starts to wonder just who Vanessa Bennett is and what connection she has to David. She picks up Vanessa's purse off of the ground, and has a look inside.

"You Walked Away" February 5, 1999

A few days after the gala, Erica goes to Vanessa who is recovering in PVH about David walking away from a patient. She asks if she rememebers that there was another doctor there that night, Dr. David Hayward, renowned cardiologist. Vanessa asks how she could forget. Erica explains that she was stunned that David just walked away. She also explains her previous conversation with David. Still unsatisfied by the answers given to her by Vanessa, she decides to go to Joe and Jake Martin. Meanwhile, David visits Vanessa and interrogates her about her stay in Pine Valley. She says maybe she wanted to see him again... the conversation is short, but it leaves us wondering what the connection is between David and Vanessa. Erica goes to Jake and Joe to find out more and to alert them that David walked away. She questions them about laws, and what could happen to a doctor if he walked away from a person in need, only to find out that the TAAD benefit wasn't the first time David had been in trouble with the hospital board. She learns that David had given Adam Chandler the wrong medication and it almost killed him.

"Looking For Answers" February 10, 1999

Upset that Erica is causing trouble at the hospital, David decides to go to Enchantment to confront Erica. He gets in by lying to Erica's secretary, he says he is Bianca's doctor. His lying infuriates Erica and does not get him anywhere. She threatens to call security, but David stops her. Realizing David isn't going to go away, she decides to give him five minutes to explain himself. He says he would like to start over, that they have a lot in common. When he suggests they could be friends, Erica says that's a bizarre and frightening thought. He says he could be of help if she needs any medical connections. He claims they share the same 'world view.' She tells him he is wrong. He says an exchange might be beneficial. Erica says he's good, but not good enough - that she created her business, that he thinks he can get his way by flattering her. She says it was her duty to report him to the hospital, actually the DA. He says Miss. Bennett was never in any danger - there was no reason for him to jump in. He wants no more misunderstandings - he tells her not to cross him or he'll be obliged to return the favor. Unfazed, Erica says her net worth exceeds his and she has great influence on the media. She says he blew his chances with her when he walked away from Vanessa, not everything is as it appears. She then brings up Adam Chandler. He says he was cleared, and asks if she ever made a mistake. Still curious about David, Erica calls up her good friend and ex-husband Adam Chandler who calls David a criminal and a sociopath.

"David's Veiled Threats" February 11, 1999

If you want to see what else we have on our channel click here.

Post by Principessa on

David manages to regain consciousness fairly quickly, with only a few scrapes on the side of his face. He looks over and sees Erica - who is completely unconscious and is barely clinging to life. After checking Erica's pulse, with a worried expression on his face, he grabs his phone and calmly calls the hospital. He calls Jake Martin, who is on staff and is surprised to learn that Erica is the passenger in critical condition. As he explains Erica's injuries and tells Jake that the wire is lodged close to her aorta and with any sudden movement Erica could bleed out. He also asks Jake to have Dr. Weiss, a plastic surgeon on stand by. David immediately starts bandaging Erica's face - which causes her to stir suddenly. She asks what happened, and David explains the accident. He tells her not to move, and that the injury is very close to her heart - she whispers that it's hard to breathe. She whispers he'll walk away and he says he won't. She says she wants Joe, she doesn't want him before she becomes unconscious again. David calls Jake again and says he is afraid Erica may die. While David is on the phone, Erica moves and as feared - starts to bleed out. David begins operating to save Erica's life.

"The Accident: Part 2" February 23, 1999

After two hours, Jake continues to try to get a chopper to David and Erica. The pilot refuses to go out, he says union regulations prohibit him from flying - Joe Martin jumps in and says he will fly because Erica is a critical patient and will die if they don't get to her soon. Back in the car, David tells Erica he did his part now she has to do hers. He tells her to keep breathing until her friends at PVH get there. He says she told him she was a fighter, and that she needs to fight. As Erica's blood pressure is dropping, David's anxiety intensifies and he calls Jake - as he's on the phone, the medevac and ambulance arrive. As they arrive at the hospital David pushes his way past Jake, he says he has to finish what he's started. David prepares to operate on Erica, but is stopped when Dr. Weiss says he needs to start on Erica's face. David tells him to get in line, that it's not going to matter, that people aren't going to care what her face looks like inside of a coffin.

"The Accident: Part 3" February 24, 1999

Post by Principessa on

A very upset Myrtle is at PVH to visit Erica, but runs into Dimitri who asks what happened. Myrtle explains the situation, but Dimitri continues to ask more questions. He wonders why she was out during a blizzard. David comes out of the ER and says Erica lost a lot of blood and has a lot of injuries but she came through the surgery fine. Myrtle asks if she can see Erica, but the nurse says there's something she needs to know. In Erica's room the nurses comment on how it's a shame, and that Erica was so beautiful. A semi-conscious Erica is laying in a hospital bed, her face is bruised and the right side of her face is covered in bandages. The nurse explains to Myrtle that other pieces of the wire went into her face, and that there wasn't time to fix it. But that they're lucky that Erica is still with them. Vanessa decides to talk to David, she says many men have tried to steal Erica's heart, but he saved it. Vanessa then goes on to talk about Erica, she says she heard she almost died. David says Erica will be very grateful that he saved her life. But Vanessa points out that he was behind the wheel of the car, and that he escaped with barely a scratch. She says he always was careless about other people's feelings, women mostly. Myrtle and Dimitri talk some more, she says she won't leave until Erica knows Myrtle is there. The nurse tells her to be prepared, and not to let Erica see how upset she is. She continues to tell Dimitri that the damage is extensive. In Erica's room, Myrtle tells Erica where she is, and that she had a car accident - and that she had them all very scared. Erica asks Myrtle what to leave, and she asks her to explain what happened to her.

"What Happened To Me?" February 25, 1999

Erica regains consciousness after her heart surgery, and continues to ask Myrtle what happened. Myrtle tells her that she needs to rest, and not to speak - she needs her strength to get well. She tells Erica not to touch the bandage on her face. Erica says she wishes her mother was with her, Myrtle says she is always with her. Myrtle explains that they put stitches around Erica's heart, but she's going to be just fine. Once again, Erica asks what happened - Myrtle, worried that she might upset Erica, says she'll get the doctor to explain it to her. Myrtle starts to get upset, and tells Erica she's beautiful before explaining that Erica's face was cut in the accident. Erica asks if she'll be alright. Out in the hallway, Dimitri and Joe Martin talk about Erica - Joe says she was very lucky to have one of the finest cardiologists with her in the car. Dimitri asks to talk to Dr. Weiss. Back in Erica's room Myrtle assures Erica that she will be okay, she tells Erica about a man who had more bandages than Erica did, and he was fine. She says all Erica needs is time to heal. During this time David walks in. When David shows up, Erica whispers a "no." Outside of the room, Dr. Weiss and Dimitri continue to talk - Dimitri says he's not sure Erica can live if he can't fix her face. In Erica's room Myrtle tells Erica that Dr. Hayward saved her life, and David asks if she remembers. She says she doesn't remember, she only remembers that she was in a storm and an airport. David seems relieved and says not to push it, that's it's normal for trauma victims to have amnesia. She asks when she will remember. He says some patients do remember, some don't. Myrtle follows David out of the room to ask him why he didn't tell Erica that he was driving the car. He says she's recovering, that it would do more harm than good to tell her about the details. Dimitri jumps in and asks what's going on. David explains he was driving and that he owes Myrtle an apology, that it was a lot more upsetting than he's willing to admit. He says she's right, that he should have pulled over. He lies and says Erica insisted that they continued driving. Dimitri visits Erica, who says she must look awful and Dimitri just smiles as he finds the right words. He tells her she looks beautiful, that she always looks beautiful. He starts talking about how on Halloween she dressed up as a mummy, and how at the end of the night he kept unwrapping the gauze, only to find her - that underneath of the bandages is the same beautiful woman. They are interrupted when David comes in to check on her. He says she's healing nicely. Erica, who doesn't know how badly her face is damaged, smiles and says she wants to go back to modeling for Enchantment's new campaign. David and Dimitri are both surprised by Erica's plans.

"Will I Be Alright?" February 26, 1999

Post by Principessa on

March 1999: After Erica’s memory made a recovery, she remembered that David (who was currently on her case) lied to her. He was the one driving on that cold, snowy February night. That night that nearly killed her. Erica decided to confront the cardiologist about lying to her. David then panicked, setting off red flags for Erica. She knew the doctor was trouble, and was done giving him chances to redeem himself.

A few days later, after hearing Erica talk about wanting to return to modeling, Erica’s ex-husband Adam Chandler made it clear to David that he would pay for hurting her and ruining her chance at ever having a successful modeling career again.

Once Erica recovered enough to finally see her face in a mirror, she couldn’t believe what was before her. The right side of her face was covered in white bandages. Erica became alarmed and curious about her condition and immediately started asking questions about her face. She made it known she was worried about her injury. How would she look? Before she could find out, David stopped Dr. Weiss, a well-known plastic surgeon in Pennsylvania from leveling with Erica about the extent of her facial injury. David was worried about her reaction after having major heart surgery not too long ago.

Finally, after having a conversation with her son, David, about his father’s death (which he blamed her for) Vanessa explained to Erica that even reconstructive surgery would never make her beautiful again. Erica then disappeared as Vanessa pretended to be concerned about her well being and insisted that she had no idea why Erica disappeared. They later found Erica, in front of reporters who asked about her face.

As always, the descriptions are ABOVE the videos.

March of 1999

As Vanessa sits on the sun porch, writing 'thank you' letters to everyone who sent her flowers, Adam Chandler appears with a smile on his face. He explained that a "mutual friend," meaning Erica, had told him about her hospitalization and the stunt that David pulled the night of the TAAD gala. He offers her flowers, and she says that Erica Kane might need them more. A shocked Adam turned white as Vanessa tells him that Erica had been involved in a horrible car accident. He explains that his and Erica's relationship was 'complex' before he went straight to Erica. Vanessa and David then talked about Adam, she wonders why he made such a powerful enemy. David says he will take care of Adam when the time is right. Already in the room, Myrtle, Janet, Opal and David talk about Erica's condition. David says he thinks it's 'admirable' that Erica refused to take any painkillers, and says that her lungs are free of fluid. Not knowing the extent of her injuries, Erica says she will be in low cut dresses in no time. Later, David walks in just as Erica tells Adam she can't remember what happened that night or who was driving, bringing a smile to the devious doctor's face.

"There's Nothing I Like About David Hayward" March 3rd 1999

As Erica's memory starts to recover, she begins to remember what happened the night of February 14th. Adam, still in the room demands answers from David when Erica reveals that David had lied to her, HE was the one driving that night. David finally admits to being the driver, but when Erica's memory starts to fail her again he suggests she get some rest. She tells him she does NOT want Adam to leave, as she continues, she tells Adam that David tried to kill her. Dismissing her accusations, David reminds her he saved her life that night and that he offered to pull off the road, but she wanted to keep going even though Erica begged him to stop driving and pull over. Adam wants to know why they were driving that night, and David says Erica wanted to meet up with a film crew back in Pine Valley. Erica, not being able to remember anything else offers to objections. David and Erica continued to argue, even bringing up that her hospital stay was costing her money because she was unable to launch her newest line of cosmetics. David says she is free to explore whatever legal channels she wants because they would side with him. She then turns to Adam and says she hasn't been this excited about work in a long time. He smiles at the bandaged woman before him. David runs into Vanessa, who asks him if Adam reminds him of someone. He offers her one name: Victor. Vanessa nodded, and admits that Victor was her late husband, David's stepfather, whose death bothered David. Their strange conversation is cut short when Adam storms into the room and says he will make David pay for what he has done to Erica.

"I'm Beginning To Remember" March 4th 1999

Post by Principessa on

Erica goes to Mona's house where she draws a bath and contemplates a razor. Dimitri discovers Erica is missing and alerts everyone. Adam and Liza are at the hospital for childbirth class and hear the news as well. Adam talks Liza into giving him an hour to help find Erica before Liza turns a WRCW crew loose with the story. Erica ignores the constant ringing of her cell phone as she dresses. Vanessa tells David Erica has disappeared and that her friends fear for her safety and sanity - David immediately suspects Vanessa told Erica the truth. Myrtle figures out that Erica went to Mona's house, but by the time Dimitri and Trevor arrive, Erica is already gone.

"Erica Disappears Part 1" March 19th, 1999

Trevor and Dimitri continue their search for Erica. David accuses Vanessa of trying to hurt Erica. Liza finds out Erica is going to give an exclusive interview with a colleague. Erica shows up at Pine Valley High School where she flashes back to her early years before the press shows up. Liza tries to stop the interview as Erica is clearly delusional. Liza tries to reach David, but Vanessa intercepts the call and instead calls the rest of the media to show up. Dimitri shows up at Mona's grave, hoping to find Erica, and prays that Erica is okay. Vanessa finally tells David that she knows where Erica is.

"Erica Disappears Part 2" March 22nd, 1999

A delusional Erica tries to manage a horde of reporters and insists she's returning to modeling while a panicked Liza tries to get Erica away from the cameras. David is furious when Vanessa won't tell him where Erica went. David takes Erica to a nearby locker room to give her a quick once over.

"Is My Face Scarred?" March 23rd, 1999

David tries to get Erica back to the hospital, but she tells him that Vanessa said her face was horribly scarred, and she wants to see what's under the bandages. Dimitri is in a panic over Erica's condition. Vanessa shows up at the library and Liza accuses her of alerting the press. David finally gives in and removes Erica's bandages, letting her see just how badly her face was injured.

"Erica Sees Her Face" March 24th, 1999

David checks on Erica, who has been brought back to the hospital and sedated after her breakdown. He and Vanessa argue over her telling Erica the truth, and she begs him to forget his father and what happened in the past and join forces with her. She says his career is ruined because of what happened to Erica's face and demands to know WHY David would risk his life like that in a blizzard. David kicks Vanessa out of his office then visits a sleeping Erica again. He's disturbed by her apparent nightmares of the accident and flashes back guiltily to their conversation before the crash.

"I Warned You!" March 25th, 1999

Post by Principessa on

April 1999: David continues to try to keep Vanessa away from Erica, as he knows that it will only result in Erica getting hurt. Once Erica is released from the hospital she breaks all of the mirrors in her house, unable to look at her face. When Erica returned to her office at Enchantment for the first time since the accident she was deeply disturbed by a letter from a supposed fan that contained a photograph of Erica's face before her surgery. While Erica is trying to restore both her face and her confidence, David is battling Adam over Liza and Colby's paternity. He eventually reveals to Adam that he has the upper hand, he knows that Adam is Colby's father and that he switched the sperm samples. David decides to torment Adam and Liza, and plans to ruin their wedding by revealing the secret. After receiving the news from David that her heart is fine and that Dr. Weiss can do no more for Erica, she decides to follow David's advice and fly to Rio to meet with a famous plastic surgeon, Dr. Fascinella.

April of 1999

David kicks Vanessa out of Erica's room, angering Erica. She demands to know why he treats his mother so badly, but David won't talk. Erica is furious David insisted on keeping the details of her injuries from her, and she rages at him, accusing him of destroying her life. David claims to understand what she's going through, angering Erica further. She fires David as her doctor and then finally breaks down in tears when she's alone.

"Get Out!" April 1st, 1999

Dimitri is stunned to see Erica packing and tries to convince David to keep her in the hospital, but he refuses. A bitter Erica tells Dimitri she never wants to see him - or her friends - again because everyone lied to her about her face. Erica returns home alone and falls apart when she looks in the mirror. She goes on a rampage, destroying mirrors in the house. She's interrupted by a call from Bianca, bringing her back to her senses. After the call, she realizes she's doing too much and needs to slow down. This triggers a memory of the accident, and she remembers that David was the one who refused to slow down that night.

"Erica Goes Home" April 6th, 1999

David checks up on Erica and panics when he sees the broken mirrors. They argue bitterly about the accident, with Erica struggling to remember the details. Erica insists her life is over now and demands to know why David didn't just let her die there in the car. David says he's never wanted to save anyone more than he wanted to save her. He insists that she is still beautiful and that her life is still worth living, but Erica is in no mood to listen.

"Why Didn't You Let Me Die?" April 7th, 1999

David demands that Vanessa stay away from Erica. When Vanessa leaves the room, Erica demands to know why he's so mean to his mother. David says he's hateful because Vanessa made him that way. He describes her as a monster and insists that Vanessa has latched onto Erica because she hates people who have something she envies. He warns her to find out what Vanessa wants and then begs her to please cut Vanessa out of her life. He's floored when Erica says she's considering letting Vanessa move in! After David storms out, Erica confronts Vanessa, who admits that David's father committed suicide. She says that David blames her and paints herself as the victim, leaving Erica confused and concerned.

"You Are A LIAR!" April 12th, 1999
